body_html:
Thanks @karmel for reminding. I have check tf.estimator.export.build_parsing_serving_input_receiver_fn and it has the same problem. Refer to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/estimator/export/export.py#L267 .

Since tensorflow.contrib.learn.python.learn.utils.input_fn_utils.build_parsing_serving_input_fn is deprecated, I would like to change the PR to fix the code in tf.estimator.export. build_parsing_serving_input_receiver_fn as well.

Please help to review with the new commit.

Since tensorflow.contrib.learn.python.learn.utils.input_fn_utils.build_parsing_serving_input_fn is deprecated, I would like to change the PR to fix the code in tf.estimator.export. build_parsing_serving_input_receiver_fn  as well.
Please help to review with the new commit.
body:
Thanks @karmel for reminding. I have check `tf.estimator.export.build_parsing_serving_input_receiver_fn` and it has the same problem. Refer to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/estimator/export/export.py#L267 .

Since `tensorflow.contrib.learn.python.learn.utils.input_fn_utils.build_parsing_serving_input_fn` is deprecated, I would like to change the PR to fix the code in `tf.estimator.export. build_parsing_serving_input_receiver_fn ` as well.

Please help to review with the new commit.
